subject: Alpine Skiing
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Tessa Worley of France fought off gusts to win a second consecutive World Cup giant slalom in Soldeu-Grandvalira, Andorra, while the overall leader, Lindsey Vonn, finished eighth.
snippet: Tessa Worley of France fought off gusts to win a second consecutive World Cup giant slalom in Soldeu-Grandvalira, Andorra, while the overall leader, Lindsey Vonn, finished eighth.
